author: Lucy Handley
title: The coronavirus means authoritarian governments are imposing 'shock doctrines' says press freedom report
description: Countries such as China, Iran and Iraq rank low on the list in part due to their handling of the media during the pandemic, according to the World Press Freedom Index published Tuesday.
content:
The coronavirus crisis has helped threaten people's right to reliable information in countries where governments have suppressed the media, according to a new report.
The World Press Freedom Index 2020 ranks 180 countries and territories in terms of their me… [+2640 chars]
